titleStmt.title: Felo de se, or, Mr. Richard Baxter's self-destroying manifested in twenty arguments against infant-baptism / gathered out of his own writing, in his second disputation of right to sacraments by John Tombes.
titleStmt.author: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
